events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a collision involving their car with another vehicle at the intersection on April 30th.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the reported car collision and damage details provided.
An agent was assigned promptly to the case to help the customer navigate the claim process smoothly.
The claim was acknowledged by the insurance company and a confirmation email was sent to the customer.
Customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police accident report for further assessment.
The customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos and the official police report within the deadline.
The investigation team initiated the claims verification process focusing on vehicle damage and liability determination.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision circumstances and verified the damage to the insured’s car.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs and related damages as per policy.
Customer provided positive feedback thanking the agent for efficient handling and clear communication throughout.
The claim was officially approved after customer’s consent to the proposed settlement terms and conditions.
Insurance payment was issued directly to the repair shop as per customer’s request and policy guidelines.
The claim was closed successfully after payment completion and confirmation of vehicle repairs from the customer.
All claim documents and communications were archived securely in the company system for future reference.
